charges.charge_description: 21:846, 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B), 841(b)(1)(C) and 841(b)(1)(D)CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS did conspire to distribute 500 grams or more of cocaine and a quanity of cocaine base(Crack)a schedule II controlled substance, and quantities of marijuana and 3,4 methylenediox-methamphetamine a I controlled substances and forfeiture allegations pursuant to Title 21:853 and 881(a)(11), Title 18:924(d) and Title 28:2461(c) (1)

21:841(a0(1), 841(b)(1)(B), 841(b)(1)(C) and 841(b)(1)(D)NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE did possess with intent to distribute 500 grams or more of cocaine and a quaniity of cocaine base(Crack) schedule II controlled substances, and quantities of marijuana and 3,4 methylenedioxy-methamphetamine schedule I controlled substances and forfeiture allegations pursuant to Title 21:853 and 881(a)(11), Title 18:924(d) and Title 28:2461(c) (2)

18: 924(c)(1) VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN did use and possess firearms in furtherance of a drug trafficking crime and forfeiture allegations pursuant to Title 21:853 and 881(a)(11), Title 18:924(d) and Title 28:2461(c) (3)

18:922(g)(1), 924(a)(2) and 924(e)(1)UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. having been a convicted felon did possess firearms and ammunition a Glock Model 22,.40caliber handgun, a Glock Model 19, 9mm handgun, a Mossberg Maverick Model 88, a 12 gauge shotgun, a Savage Model 93R17,.22 caliber rifle and 9mm ammunition and having been transported in interstate commerce and forfeiture allegations pursuant to Title 21:853 and 881(a)(11), Title 18:924(d) and Title 28:2461(c) (4)
